Require Import Coq.Setoids.Setoid.
 Require Import Coq.ZArith.ZArith.
 Require Import Coq.micromega.Psatz.
 Local Open Scope Z.
 Definition mono (f: Z -> Z): Prop :=   forall n m, n <= m -> f n <= f m.
  Lemma const_mono: forall a: Z,   mono (fun x => a). 
(**********)
